title: On RTC Las Vegas bus lines, Fully furnished apartments, Bad Credit Ok
posting_body: ['Craig Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Apartment near Nellis Air Force Base', '-Rent by the week or month', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-No long term lease required', '-Easy freeway access', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-High speed WIFI included', '-Large studio apartments', '-On RTC Las Vegas bus lines', '-Near Las Vegas Speedway', '-Laundry facilities', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
